articles.content: (Reuters) - COVID-19 vaccines developed by Pfizer Inc with BioNTech SE and Moderna Inc reduced risk of infection by 80% two weeks or more after the first of two shots, according to data from a real-w… [+2900 chars]

articles.title: More than a dozen states to open vaccines to all adults - ABC News
